teamtitle.title: About us
teamtitle.text: Barbara and Sindhu’s collaboration and friendship started spontaneously in 2018 when they met in Rishikesh.

teammembers.name: Barbara Münz
teammembers.text: Barbara from Germany is a mother, yoga teacher and Master Crafts woman for 50 years. She shares her passion, time, resources and expertise most generously.

teammembers.name: Sindhu Eswaran
teammembers.text: Sindhu from India, is an enthusiastic, creative educator whose interests and wide range of skills have combined in her ongoing work with women and children.
